ModMetaData.name: The Yanorian Rim - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: Heart Storm
ModMetaData.description: A mod that adds two races to RimWorld: A race of cloaked beings called the Drael, and their dragon partners (This is the dev version of The Yanorian Rim. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
